description: This file contains unit tests for the Core::MeasurementType template class in the WPEFramework project, specifically testing its measurement collection and statistical methods.

classes.name: Core::MeasurementType<uint8_t>
classes.description: A template class used for measuring and calculating statistics such as min, max, average, and count over a series of measurements.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Method to record a new measurement.

methods.name: Min
methods.description: Method to retrieve the minimum recorded measurement.

methods.name: Max
methods.description: Method to retrieve the maximum recorded measurement.

methods.name: Last
methods.description: Method to retrieve the most recent measurement.

methods.name: Average
methods.description: Method to compute and retrieve the average of all measurements.

methods.name: Measurements
methods.description: Method to get the total number of measurements recorded.

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Method to reset the measurement data.
